name: Bitcoin Miner Farm: Clicker
description:
Start building your bitcoin empire. All what you have is little amount of video cards and apartment in poor condition. You can increase your wealth by tapping on virtual bitcoins. This cryptocurrency will help you become rich! Buy new cards, mine more btc, buy new furniture in your home, make interior more luxury. Every click is worth it! Create your own bitcoin farm!

You can spend your money on investments. Buy new offices and build your company! Your employees will help you to mine bitcoins and diamonds. You can unleash your business potential! Invest in your future! Make a fortune and you will have luxury apartments with exclusive furniture and even your own cute cat. You should care about him and he will help you to become successful.

Don't give spiders a chance to build their homes in video cards! Chase mice away and remove viruses! Abuse supercoins! Four seasons are present. In each season you will have different challenges. Bitcoins can be covered with ice in winter, and in summer the flames can cover your shelves with video cards.
Cold, heat and enemies should not stop you.
Bitcoin Miner Farm is a unique mining farming simulation game with tap, swipe and click mechanics. Upgrade offices to make diamonds and earn extra cash. Bitcoins are not real!
